full_summary:
# **Tender Notification: Kinngait Detachment Project, Nunavut**

## Details

| **Notification** | **Date** | **Reference** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4289276213 |  |
| **Publication Date** | January 28, 2024 |  |
| **Closing Date** | March 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST |  |

## Project Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) invites qualified professionals to provide engineering services for the Kinngait Detachment Project in Nunavut. The selected contractors will be responsible for designing and delivering professional engineering solutions to support the project requirements.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposal evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

* **Technical Merit** (40%)
* **Price** (60%)

## Union Agreement

This project is subject to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.canada.ca/en/trade-agreements/current-agreements/canadian-free-trade-agreement.html).

## Regions of Opportunity

The successful contractor must be able to deliver services to the **Nunavut Territory** and other regions within **Canada**.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Alex Tikhonovitch (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Access the complete tender notice on the Ariba website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18634832?extsite=MTg2MzQ4MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
